content.title: NBCFDC General Loan Scheme
content.department: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
content.details: A general loan scheme by the Ministry of Social Justice for Indian citizens from backward classes for various income-generating activities. Loan up to ₹15 Lakh per beneficiary for pursuing income-generating activities such as Agriculture and Allied Activities, Small Business/Artisan & Traditional Occupation, Transport Sector & Service Sector, and Technical & Professional Trades/Courses.
benefits: Loan up to ₹15 Lakh per beneficiary for pursuing income generating activities such as Agriculture and Allied Activities, Small Business/Artisan & Traditional Occupation, Transport Sector & Service Sector, and Technical & Professional Trades/Courses.
The rate of interest would be as follows - Loan up to ₹ 5.00 Lakh: 6% per annum; Loan above ₹5.00 Lakh up to ₹ 10.00 Lakh: 7% per annum; Loan above ₹10.00 Lakh up to ₹ 15.00 Lakh: 8% per annum.
eligibility: The applicant must be an Entrepreneur
The applicant must be from a Backward Class (OBC).
The Total Annual Family Income of the applicant must be Less than ₹ 3 Lakh per Annum.
content.application_process: Eligible persons desirous of obtaining TERM LOAN under NBCFDC scheme should apply on prescribed form (available with the Channel Partners) to District Office of Channel Partners where he/she normally resides. The applicant should clearly mention his/her felt needs and choice of vocation and training requirements, if any, in the application form.
documents_required: Relevant Caste Certificate to be issued by the relevant authority of District Administration.
Passport size Photograph of the applicant
Certificate of Income issued by Competent Authority of State Government/Distt. Administration or Antyodaya Anna Yojana(AAY) Card or Below Poverty Line (BPL) Card.

Annual family income certificate may be considered by the SCAs/Banks/SSCs on self-certification of the beneficiaries with the endorsement of the same by any Gazetted Officer notified by State/Central Government.
In case of the loan being applied at the Bank (Channel Partner), Self-Certification assessed and endorsed by the Branch Manager can be used for providing the loan.

faqs.question: What is the maximum size of the loan under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, the eligible entrepreneur can obtain a loan of max. ₹15,00,000 per beneficiary.

faqs.question: How much will be the interest rate for the loan?
faqs.answer: The rate of interest would be as follows - Loan up to ₹ 5.00 Lakh: 6% per annum Loan above ₹5.00 Lakh up to ₹ 10.00 Lakh: 7% per annum Loan above ₹10.00 Lakh up to ₹ 15.00 Lakh: 8% per annum.

faqs.question: By when am I expected to repay the loan?
faqs.answer: Loan is to be repaid in quarterly instalments with maximum 8 years (including the moratorium period of six months on the recovery of principal).

faqs.question: Can women entrepreneurs also apply to this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scheme is open for income generating activities. Women entrepreneurs are therefore eligible to apply.

faqs.question: Is there a helpline number where I can get answers for my queries reg. the application process?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Toll Free Number is 18001023399.
